IIR Filter Documentation

This is the HTML documentation on IIR Filters in Pd.

1st Order Allpass

bilinear transform with frequency warping from Laplace domain into z-domain
(see "Halbleiter-Schaltungstechnik", U.Tietze & Ch. Schenk, 12. Auflage 2002, Springer, page 1054ff, formula (19.42) )
(or see Wikipedia_Bilinear_Transform_Frequency_Warping_ff)

transfer function of the allpass filter in Laplace domain
independent normalized complex spectral variable in Laplace domain
polynomial coefficients in z-domain and difference equation
j-th samples of the input and output sequence of the difference equation
imaginary unit
independent frequency
-90 degree phase shift frequency of the allpass filter
sampling frequency
